definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: They placed dirt and rocks in a pan and then filled it about half way with water.
sentences.chinese: 他們在平底鍋安置了土和岩石然後填裝了一半。

sentences.english: She emptied the bottle of milk into a saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 她把瓶中的牛乳全倒進平底鍋。

sentences.english: Pans are not as handy as works for Chinese cooking.
sentences.chinese: 做中國菜時，平底鍋不如中式炒菜鍋好用。

sentences.english: Put red peppers in a pan and burn their skin on low fire.
sentences.chinese: 把整個紅椒放到平底鍋裏，用小火慢慢將皮烤焦。

sentences.english: Pour the water into a pan and bring it to boil.
Put it into the pan with potatoes – boiled and mashed.
sentences.chinese: 將它倒入裝有煮熟搗碎的土豆的平底鍋內。

sentences.english: Bring cranberry juice to boil in large saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 把酸果蔓汁倒入平底鍋中煮沸。

sentences.english: Pour the ingredients into a twenty-five cubic inch pan.
sentences.chinese: 再把這些配料倒進一個25立方英寸的平底鍋中。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，準備一個羊皮紙內襯平底鍋。

sentences.english: Sentences: Place the pan on the stove.
sentences.chinese: 把平底鍋放在天然氣竈上。

sentences.english: Toast the dried chillies in a hot pan until they start to singe .
sentences.chinese: 將幹辣椒放在燒熱的平底鍋裏煸至微焦。

sentences.english: Take the saucepan off the stove.
Many oil pans have baffles , which are thin metal partitions.
sentences.chinese: 許多石油平底鍋有擋板，這是薄金屬分割。

sentences.english: The pan can be used to cook (for cooking) eggs.
sentences.chinese: 這個平底鍋可以用來煎雞蛋。

sentences.english: B – The fish is seared in a skillet then baked and served with ginger and mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 先將魚放平底鍋上煎，然後烘培最後配上姜和蘑菇。

sentences.english: Put the turner in the pan.

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
